alert.note: Alert for Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Newton County through 800 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Conehatta, or 9 miles south of Prospect, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stratton around 750 PM CDT. Little Rock around 755 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for east central Mississippi.
